title: New Mexico Governor Pushes for Better Internet at Rural Schools
text:
19 New Mexico Governor Pushes for Better Internet at Rural Schools 
Center for Digital Education: Several state agencies have finalized plans for spending about $49 million to improve Internet access for New Mexicoâ€™s rural students by 2018, Gov. Susana Martinez announced Thursday.
